snippet: Educational Alliance, an agency that runs an after-school program at Public School 188, drew money from The Neediest Cases Fund to buy uniform shirts for 184 students there.
abstract: Educational Alliance, a beneficiary agency of UJA-Federation of New York, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps purchase school uniforms for 184 middle-school students at Public School 188 in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: Educational Alliance, an agency that runs an after-school program at Public School 188, drew money from The Neediest Cases Fund to buy uniform shirts for 184 students there.

headline.main: Lower East Side Students Have a Gift of Uniforms, and Better Focus
headline.print_headline: Lower East Side Students Have a Gift of Uniforms, and Better Focus

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
